Secondly, we should consider the size of the rooms. Larger rooms may contain more objects, increasing the chance of finding a handbag. Room_11 is the largest room among the neighbors with a volume of 42.78.

Lastly, we should consider the floor number. Since room_11 is on the same floor ('B') as the current room (room_9), it would be more efficient to search this room next, rather than moving to a different floor.

Based on these considerations, the best choice would be to go to room_11 next.
